HSK 5: 砍
HSK 6: 嵌,侃
Freq: 7836
（形声。从页，咸声。本义：因饥饿而面黄肌瘦的样子） 同本义 [sallow and emaciated;lean and haggard]
(Phonetic. From the page, salty sound. Original meaning: looking yellow and thin because of hunger) Same original meaning [sallow and emaciated; lean and haggard]

顑字的基本解释

顑
kǎn
〔顑頷（
h刵 ）〕面黄饥瘦，如“长顑顑亦何伤！”

顑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǎn］
［《廣韻》苦感切，上感，溪。］
(1)因飢饿而面黄肌瘦。
(2)面颊；腮。
(3)颔，下巴颏。

顑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顑； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1407第12
【廣韻】苦感切，音坎。【說文】飯不飽，面黃起行也。【廣韻】瘦也。【屈原·離騷】苟余情其信姱以練要兮，長顑頷亦何傷。【韓愈·送賈島歸范陽詩】欲以金帛酬，舉室常顑頷。【註】頷，顄也，顄即頤。顑，饑貌，言面頤虛浮也。　又【廣韻】玉陷切，音㺌。顑長面也。　又【集韻】苦紺切，音勘。食不飽也。　又呼紺切，酣去聲。義同。

顑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
顑字的起名意思

暂无。

顑
kǎn
〔顑颔(
h 刵)] The face is yellow, hungry and thin, such as "How long does it hurt?"
顑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǎn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of bitterness, feeling on it, and creek. ]
(1) Yellow face and thin skin due to hunger.
(2) Cheeks; cheeks.
(3) Jaw, chin.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顑; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1407 No. 12
[Guang Yun] The bitterness is cut, and the tone is high. [Said Wen] If you don't have enough food, you can start your trip even if you have a yellow face. [Guang Yun] Thin too. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Gou Yuqing's faith is to practice and behave, so it hurts to have a long chin. [Han Yu·Send Jia Dao to Fan Yang Poetry] If you want to be paid with gold and silk, your room is often banished. [Note] 颔, 顄也, 顄 is Yi.顑, hungry appearance, words and faces are also vain.　[Guangyun] The jade is trapped and cut, the sound is 㺌. Long noodles too.　[Jiyun] bitterly cut, sound survey. Not full of food.　 He whispered and cut again, screaming. The same meaning.
